title: How to Make Basil Butter

steps.headline: Chop or tear the basil into small pieces.
Cream the butter.
steps.description: Knead with the back of a wooden spoon.

steps.headline: Add the chopped basil to the butter.
steps.description: Blend through with the wooden spoon.

steps.headline: Lay out wax paper on the work surface.
steps.description: Place the blended basil butter onto the paper. Roll into a sausage shape. Sprinkle with more chopped basil.

steps.headline: Roll the wax paper around the butter log.
steps.description: Place into the butter log in the refrigerator to chill.

steps.headline: Serve.
steps.description: To serve, simply slice small pieces off the log and use as needed, either for spreading or adding as a dollop on meat, fish, hot vegetables or hot bread.

text: Preparing the basil Wash the dry basil. Shake dry. Chop or tear the basil into small pieces.  Blending in the butter Cream the butter. Knead with the back of a wooden spoon. Add the chopped basil to the butter. Blend through with the wooden spoon. Forming the basil butter log Lay out wax paper on the work surface. Place the blended basil butter onto the paper. Roll into a sausage shape. Sprinkle with more chopped basil. Roll the wax paper around the butter log. Place into the butter log in the refrigerator to chill. Serve. To serve, simply slice small pieces off the log and use as needed, either for spreading or adding as a dollop on meat, fish, hot vegetables or hot bread.
